channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 24 dead in Texas floods and more than 20 children missing from a girls summer camp
item.description: Heavy rains have caused devastating flash floods in Texas Hill Country, killing at least 24 people and leaving many others missing.

item.title: Texas families plead for information on at least 23 girls missing from summer camp after floods
Flash floods like the one that swept through Texas are the nationâ€™s top storm-related killer
